decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (89800001P1 received 23/01/2014, 89800002P2, 89820002P2 received 10/02/2014 and 89810003P4 received 03/04/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The parking spaces hereby approved shall not be used  unless the following planting is carried out in the first available planting season after commencement of the works hereby approved: Hedera colchica 'Dentata Variegata' along the south and west boundaries at two metre centres on  the boundary, to be  trained to grow up the adjacent boundary enclosure in planting beds surfaced with a bark chipping mulch, two silver birch trees located in the triangular nibs in between spaces 6 and 7 and 2 and 3, one silver birch tree adjacent to parking space 16,  together with the trees  proposed to be planted on the plans hereby approved, which shall also be silver birches, all in planting beds surfaced with a bark chipping mulch, together with four planting beds along the western boundary and three on the eastern boundary spaced equally each not less than one metre square, each surfaced with a bark chipping mulch, each  containing  not less than three Juniperus horizontalis . The planting shall be retained permanently and fed and watered for the first year after planting following a regime designed to ensure that they thrive.  Any parts of the planting that die within the first five years of installation shall be replaced in the next available planting season.
description: Enlargement of the existing car park, erection of new fencing around the perimeter of the car park and erection of chilller plant, compound enclosure and lighting bollards
